meta.title: DevCloud — Software Development & Digital Solutions | Algeria
meta.description: DevCloud delivers enterprise software solutions, cloud platforms, and digital transformation services for organizations across Algeria and North Africa.
meta.og_description: Enterprise software solutions, cloud platforms, and digital transformation services for organizations across Algeria and North Africa.

hero.subtitle: DevCloud delivers enterprise-grade platforms, cloud solutions, and custom software for transport authorities, government agencies, and growing businesses across Algeria.

trust.label: Trusted by transport organizations across Algeria

services.label: What We Do
services.title: End-to-end software development for complex operations
services.subtitle: From architecture to deployment, we build systems that organizations depend on every day.
services.s1_desc: Purpose-built applications designed around your business processes. We work with Laravel, React, Vue.js, and modern cloud-native architectures.
services.s2_desc: Multi-tenant cloud platforms with subscription billing, role-based access, and enterprise security. Built for scale from day one.
services.s3_desc: Scalable hosting, CI/CD pipelines, automated deployments, and 24/7 monitoring. Your systems stay online when it matters most.
services.s4_desc: SOC-compliant systems with end-to-end encryption, audit logging, and access controls designed for government and regulated industries.
services.s5_desc: Connect your existing systems with modern APIs, payment gateways, government databases, and third-party services.
services.s6_desc: Responsive web apps and mobile solutions for public-facing services, internal tools, and customer engagement platforms.

featured.label: Featured Product
featured.title: CloudRoutes: Bus Company Management Platform
featured.desc: CloudRoutes is a management platform built for urban and suburban bus companies. It handles everything from QR ticketing and passenger wallets to agent operations, fleet GPS tracking, financial reconciliation, and daily reporting.
featured.f1: QR-based ticketing and digital passenger wallets
featured.f2: Live GPS fleet tracking and route monitoring

products.label: Our Products
products.title: Three platforms, one mission: digitize your operations
products.subtitle: Purpose-built solutions for transport, customer engagement, and back-office automation.
products.p1_desc: QR ticketing, passenger wallets, GPS fleet tracking, agent operations, financial reconciliation, and daily reporting for urban and suburban bus companies.
products.p2_desc: Private, self-hosted chatbots powered by large language models. Retrieval-augmented generation and fine-tuning on your company's data. Your knowledge stays on your servers.
products.p3_desc: End-to-end workflow automation using agentic AI services and tools like n8n. Connect your CRM, ERP, email, databases, and third-party APIs into seamless automated pipelines.

partnership.label: Strategic Partner
partnership.title: Official Chargily Integration Partner
partnership.desc: We are a strategic technology partner of Chargily, Algeria's leading fintech platform. We build on their infrastructure and deliver seamless payment integration for businesses across Algeria.
partnership.check_1: Chargily Pay — Accept CIB and EDAHABIA payments online with secure checkout, payment links, and a free open-source API
partnership.check_2: Chargily Pro — Distribute mobile top-ups for Mobilis, Djezzy, Ooredoo, and Idoom through automated API infrastructure
partnership.check_3: Full-Stack Integration — We integrate Chargily's payment gateway directly into your applications, e-commerce platforms, and SaaS products

about.label: Why DevCloud
about.title: Built in Algeria, engineered for the world
about.subtitle: We combine local expertise with international engineering standards to deliver software that works.
about.a1_desc: We understand Algerian business requirements, regulatory frameworks, and infrastructure challenges. Our solutions are built for the local context.
about.a2_desc: Every system we ship includes automated testing, monitoring, disaster recovery, and documentation. No shortcuts, no technical debt left behind.
about.a3_desc: We do not disappear after launch. Ongoing maintenance, feature development, and 24/7 support are standard with every engagement.
about.a4_desc: Laravel, React, Vue.js, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker. We use proven, maintainable technologies that your team can build on.

cta.title: Ready to build something that lasts?
cta.subtitle: Tell us about your project. We will get back to you within 24 hours with an initial assessment.

contact.label: Get in Touch
contact.title: Let's discuss your project
contact.subtitle: Whether you need a full platform build, a technical consultation, or ongoing development support, we are here to help.
contact.form_message_placeholder: Tell us about your project requirements...

footer.brand_desc: Enterprise software development and cloud solutions for organizations across Algeria.

cr_page.meta_title: CloudRoutes — Bus Company Management Platform | DevCloud
cr_page.meta_description: CloudRoutes is a management platform for urban and suburban bus companies. QR ticketing, GPS tracking, financial reconciliation, and daily reporting in one system.
cr_page.hero_tagline: The management platform for bus companies
cr_page.hero_desc: CloudRoutes handles everything from QR ticketing and passenger wallets to agent operations, fleet GPS tracking, financial reconciliation, and daily reporting — replacing paper-based workflows with a single digital system.
cr_page.features_title: Everything a bus company needs, nothing it does not
cr_page.features_subtitle: Ten modules built around real daily operations at Algerian transport companies.
cr_page.f1_desc: QR-based ticketing that works instantly — even with damaged or dirty codes. No paper waste, no manual counting, no disputes.
cr_page.f1_d1: Instant QR code generation and validation
cr_page.f1_d2: Works with scratched, faded, or partially damaged codes
cr_page.f1_d3: Eliminates paper ticket printing and storage
cr_page.f1_d4: Automatic fare calculation per route and zone
cr_page.f2_desc: Smartphone users pay through a mobile app with a digital wallet. Passengers without smartphones use physical prepaid cards. Same balance, same system — nobody left behind.
cr_page.f2_d2: Physical prepaid card for non-smartphone users
cr_page.f2_d3: Unified balance across both payment methods
cr_page.f2_d4: Top-up at kiosks, agents, or online
cr_page.f3_desc: Live GPS tracking for your entire fleet. Monitor routes, speeds, and driver behavior in real time. Full journey history stored for review.
cr_page.f3_d1: Real-time position updates on a live map
cr_page.f4_desc: Receivers collect fares on buses. Controllers sell cards at kiosks. Both work offline — transactions sync automatically when back online.
cr_page.f4_d2: Automatic sync when connection is restored
cr_page.f4_d4: Per-agent transaction logs and shift tracking
cr_page.f5_desc: Replace handwritten trip sheets with a digital road paper system. Carnet tracking, auto-fill suggestions, gap detection, and admin approval — all audit-logged.
cr_page.f5_d1: Digital carnet and trip sheet management
cr_page.f5_d2: Auto-fill with smart suggestions based on history
cr_page.f5_d3: Gap detection for missing or inconsistent entries
cr_page.f5_d4: Admin approval workflow with full audit trail
cr_page.f6_title: Money In, Money Out, Nothing Lost
cr_page.f6_desc: Thread-safe financial engine. Every deposit, withdrawal, and card sale is tracked and reconciled. Agents submit daily settlements, admins approve with full visibility.
cr_page.f6_d4: Complete reconciliation with zero discrepancy tolerance
cr_page.f7_desc: Run instant rewards, challenge goals, or streak bonuses to keep passengers coming back. Configurable campaigns with tiered earnings.
cr_page.f7_d1: Points-based loyalty with configurable earn rates
cr_page.f7_d2: Streak bonuses for consecutive ridership days
cr_page.f7_d4: Tiered reward levels for frequent riders
cr_page.f8_desc: Monthly and yearly passes for students, employees, and frequent riders. Photo-based cards linked to schools and companies.
cr_page.f8_d2: Photo-ID cards linked to educational institutions
cr_page.f9_desc: Performance dashboards per agent, per line, per shift. Carnet utilization, daily trends, approval rates, and exportable PDF reports.
cr_page.f9_d3: Approval rate tracking and bottleneck detection
cr_page.f9_d4: One-click PDF export for management review
cr_page.f10_desc: Full interface in three languages — built for the Algerian market from day one.
cr_page.f10_d1: Complete RTL support for Arabic interface
cr_page.f10_d2: French and English for administrative users
cr_page.f10_d4: Localized date, currency, and number formatting
cr_page.cta_title: Ready to digitize your bus operations?
cr_page.cta_subtitle: Get a walkthrough of CloudRoutes tailored to your company's routes, fleet size, and operational needs.

ai_page.meta_title: AI Chatbots — Self-Hosted LLM Assistants | DevCloud
ai_page.meta_description: Private, self-hosted AI chatbots with retrieval-augmented generation and fine-tuning. Your company knowledge, your servers, your control.
ai_page.hero_desc: Self-hosted chatbots powered by large language models. We deploy private AI assistants that understand your business — trained on your documents, policies, and processes. Retrieval-augmented generation and fine-tuning keep answers accurate. Everything runs on your own infrastructure. Nothing leaves your servers.
ai_page.v1_desc: Your data never leaves your servers. Complete sovereignty over company knowledge and customer conversations.
ai_page.v2_desc: Retrieval-augmented generation pulls real information from your documents before the model generates a response.
ai_page.v3_desc: Models trained on your terminology, your processes, and your context. Accurate answers on the first try.
ai_page.features_title: AI that knows your business as well as your best employee
ai_page.features_subtitle: From document ingestion to customer-facing deployment, every piece is built for enterprise use.
ai_page.f1_desc: Feed the system your internal documents — PDFs, Word files, spreadsheets, knowledge bases, wikis, and FAQ archives. The pipeline chunks, embeds, and indexes everything into a vector store optimized for fast retrieval.
ai_page.f1_d1: Supports PDF, DOCX, XLSX, HTML, Markdown, and plain text
ai_page.f1_d4: Incremental updates — add new documents without re-indexing
ai_page.f2_desc: When a user asks a question, the system retrieves the most relevant passages from your indexed knowledge base and provides them as context to the language model. The result is grounded, factual answers instead of hallucinated guesses.
ai_page.f2_d1: Semantic search across your entire knowledge base
ai_page.f2_d2: Source citations included with every answer
ai_page.f2_d3: Configurable retrieval depth and relevance thresholds
ai_page.f2_d4: Fallback responses when confidence is low
ai_page.f3_desc: Go beyond RAG. Fine-tune open-source LLMs on your company's language, terminology, and decision patterns. The model learns how your business communicates — not just what it knows.
ai_page.f3_d2: Tone and style alignment to your brand voice
ai_page.f4_desc: Deploy your chatbot wherever your customers and employees already are. Embed it on your website, connect it to WhatsApp, integrate it into your internal tools, or expose it via API.
ai_page.f4_d1: Embeddable web widget for your website
ai_page.f4_d3: Internal tools integration via REST API
ai_page.f5_desc: Track what users ask, which answers satisfy them, and where the system struggles. Use analytics to improve your knowledge base, refine the model, and measure deflection rates against human support.
ai_page.f5_d3: Unanswered question detection for knowledge gaps
ai_page.f6_desc: Control who can manage the knowledge base, who can view analytics, and which chatbot personas serve which departments. Full audit logging on every configuration change.
ai_page.f6_d2: Per-department chatbot personas and knowledge scoping
ai_page.f6_d4: SSO integration with your identity provider
ai_page.cta_title: Put your company knowledge to work
ai_page.cta_subtitle: We will assess your documents, recommend the right model architecture, and deploy a working prototype on your infrastructure.

auto_page.meta_title: Business Automation — Agentic Workflows & Integration | DevCloud
auto_page.meta_description: End-to-end business automation using agentic AI services and workflow tools like n8n. Connect your systems, eliminate manual work, and scale operations.
auto_page.hero_title: Stop doing manually what software can do for you
auto_page.hero_desc: We build end-to-end workflow automation for companies using agentic AI services and tools like n8n. Connect your CRM, ERP, email, databases, and third-party APIs into seamless automated pipelines. Every repetitive process in your company is a candidate for automation.
auto_page.v1_desc: AI agents that make decisions, call APIs, and complete tasks autonomously based on rules and context.
auto_page.v2_desc: Self-hosted n8n instances for visual workflow building, giving your team full visibility and control.
auto_page.v3_desc: Connect ERPs, CRMs, email, databases, payment gateways, and custom APIs into unified data flows.
auto_page.features_title: Automation that runs your back office while you focus on growth
auto_page.features_subtitle: From invoice processing to lead routing, we automate the workflows that drain your team's time.
auto_page.f1_desc: Design automation pipelines with a visual drag-and-drop interface powered by n8n. Non-technical team members can understand what each workflow does. Developers can extend with custom code when needed.
auto_page.f1_d2: Visual canvas for building and editing workflows
auto_page.f1_d4: Custom JavaScript and Python nodes for complex logic
auto_page.f2_desc: Go beyond simple if-then rules. Our agentic AI can read emails, classify intent, extract structured data from unstructured documents, make routing decisions, and escalate when uncertain — all without human intervention.
auto_page.f2_d2: Document data extraction from invoices, contracts, forms
auto_page.f2_d3: Smart routing based on content, priority, and workload
auto_page.f3_desc: Sync data between your sales pipeline, accounting system, inventory, and customer support tools. No more copying data between spreadsheets. No more stale records in disconnected systems.
auto_page.f3_d1: Bidirectional sync between CRM and ERP
auto_page.f3_d3: Invoice generation triggered by deal closure
auto_page.f3_d4: Real-time inventory updates across sales channels
auto_page.f4_desc: Send the right notification to the right person at the right time. Trigger SMS alerts, email notifications, Slack messages, or WhatsApp updates based on workflow events and business rules.
auto_page.f4_d2: Conditional triggers based on data thresholds
auto_page.f5_desc: Automate document-heavy workflows. Incoming invoices, purchase orders, contracts, and applications get parsed, validated, classified, and routed — without anyone opening a PDF manually.
auto_page.f5_d4: Archival and retrieval with searchable metadata
auto_page.f6_desc: Every workflow execution is logged with input data, output data, timing, and status. When something fails, you know exactly where and why. Retry failed executions with one click.
auto_page.f6_d3: Failure alerts with automatic retry options
auto_page.cta_title: Which process should we automate first?
auto_page.cta_subtitle: We will map your operations, identify the highest-value automation targets, and build a working pipeline you can see in action.

cp_page.meta_title: Chargily Partnership — Payment Integration Services | DevCloud
cp_page.meta_description: DevCloud is an official Chargily integration partner. We build and integrate Chargily Pay and Chargily Pro payment solutions for businesses across Algeria.
cp_page.hero_desc: We are an official integration partner of Chargily, Algeria's leading fintech platform. Together, we bring seamless digital payment solutions to businesses, e-commerce platforms, and SaaS products across Algeria.
cp_page.about_subtitle: Chargily is an Algerian fintech company providing borderless payment solutions for individuals and businesses. Their platform supports online payments, mobile top-ups, and digital financial services across the country.
cp_page.about1_desc: Accept CIB and EDAHABIA cards online with secure checkout. Visa and Mastercard support coming soon.
cp_page.about2_desc: Automated distribution of prepaid telecom credits for Mobilis, Djezzy, Ooredoo, and Idoom operators.
cp_page.about3_desc: 99.9% uptime SLA with bank-grade security, real-time webhooks, and full transaction reconciliation.
cp_page.about4_desc: Free, well-documented RESTful APIs with SDKs and pre-built plugins for popular platforms.
cp_page.f1_desc: Chargily Pay is an electronic payment gateway that enables your business to accept CIB and EDAHABIA card payments through your website, app, or simple payment links. No website required to start collecting payments.
cp_page.f1_d1: Secure checkout integration for websites and apps
cp_page.f1_d2: Payment links — share via SMS, email, or social media
cp_page.f1_d3: No subscription fees, no activation costs
cp_page.f1_d4: Free API access with open-source plugins
cp_page.f1_d5: Real-time transaction dashboard and unlimited payouts
cp_page.f2_desc: Chargily Pro is a distribution platform for resellers, wholesalers, and businesses that need to distribute mobile credit top-ups at scale. Automate your telecom recharge operations through a powerful API.
cp_page.f2_d1: Support for Mobilis, Djezzy, Ooredoo, and Idoom (ADSL + 4G)
cp_page.f2_d2: Secure RESTful API with real-time webhook notifications
cp_page.f2_d3: Centralized management dashboard with sales analytics
cp_page.f3_title: We Build the Bridge Between Chargily and Your Business
cp_page.f3_desc: As an official integration partner, DevCloud provides end-to-end Chargily integration services. We handle the technical complexity so you can focus on growing your business.
cp_page.f3_d1: E-commerce payment gateway integration (Laravel, WordPress, Shopify)
cp_page.f3_d2: Custom checkout flows for SaaS and subscription billing
cp_page.f3_d3: Mobile app payment SDK integration (iOS and Android)
cp_page.f3_d4: Automated top-up systems with Chargily Pro API
cp_page.f3_d5: Webhook handling, error recovery, and transaction monitoring
cp_page.process_subtitle: Our integration process is structured, transparent, and designed to get you accepting payments as fast as possible.
cp_page.step1_desc: We analyze your business model, platform architecture, and payment requirements to recommend the right Chargily products.
cp_page.step2_desc: Our engineers implement the Chargily API into your application with secure checkout, webhook handling, and error recovery.
cp_page.step3_desc: End-to-end testing across all payment methods, edge cases, and failure scenarios in Chargily's sandbox environment.
cp_page.step4_desc: Production deployment with monitoring, alerting, and ongoing support to ensure your payment flow runs without interruption.
cp_page.cta_subtitle: Whether you need Chargily Pay for e-commerce or Chargily Pro for mobile top-up distribution, we handle the full integration.
